briefdescription.para: If true renderer will use ray tracing, if false it will use rasterization.
Keeps track of whether or not the graphics pipeline needs to be recreated.
Keeps track of whether or not the swapchain needs to be recreated.
Can be set to avoid pipeline recreation everytime a directional light is added.
Can be set to avoid pipeline recreation everytime a point light is added.
Can be set to avoid pipeline recreation everytime a geometry instance is added.
The maximum amount of geometry (Must be a multiple of minimum storage buffer alignment).
The maximum amount of textures.
Where all assets like models, textures and shaders are stored.
Stores the clear color.
The maximum recursion depth.
The current recursion depth.
Keeps track of whether or not the jitter cam is enabled.
Stores the sample rate of the jitter cam.
Stores the sample rate per raygen invocation.
Keeps track of whether or not SSAA is enabled.
Stores the amount of samples per pixel for SSAA.
Keeps track of whether or not the graphics pipelines should be recreated automatically as soon as possible.
Keeps track of whether or not the swapchain should be recreated automatically as soon as possible.
Used to set the recursion depth.

detaileddescription.para:
The function will trigger a pipeline recreation as soon as possible unless it was explicitely disabled using setAutomaticPipelineRefresh(bool). If a value higher than the device's maximum supported value is set, it will use the maximum value instead.
recursionDepth
The new value for the recursion depth.

briefdescription.para: Used to changed the clear color.

detaileddescription.para:
The function will trigger a swapchain recreation as soon as possible unless it was explicitely disabled using setAutomaticPipelineRefresh(bool).
clearColor
The new value for the clear color.

briefdescription.para: Used to set a path to the directory containing all assets.

detaileddescription.para:
This path should contain all models, textures and shaders.
argc
The argc parameter that can be retrieved from the main-function's parameters.
argv
The argv parameter that can be retrieved from the main-function's parameters.

briefdescription.para: Used to set a path to the directory containing all assets.

detaileddescription.para:
This path should contain all models, textures and shaders.
path
The path to assets.

simplesect.para: Returns true if ray tracing is enabled and false if rasterization is enabled.

xrefdescription.para: This function will be pointless once the new pipeline system is implemented.

briefdescription.para: Used to enable or disable ray tracing.

detaileddescription.para:
The function will trigger a swapchain recreation as soon as possible unless it was explicitely disabled using setAutomaticPipelineRefresh(bool).
flag
If false, ray tracing will be disabled.
Todo
This function will be pointless once the new pipeline system is implemented.

briefdescription.para: Used to toggle the automatic pipeline recreation.

parameterdescription.para: If false, the pipelines will not be recreated automatically until this function is called with true.

briefdescription.para: Used to set the maximum amount of directional lights that can be used.

parameterdescription.para: The amount of maximum directional lights.

briefdescription.para: Used to set the maximum amount of point lights that can be used.

parameterdescription.para: The amount of maximum point lights.

briefdescription.para: Used to set the maximum amount of geometrys that can be used.

simplesect.para: Returns the maximum recursion depth on the GPU.

briefdescription.para: Used to set the maximum of geometry (models).

detaileddescription.para:
Try to keep this as small as possible, as this affects performance.
amount
The amount of maximum geometry.

simplesect.para: Returns the maximum amount of geometry.

briefdescription.para: Used to toggle the jitter cam.

detaileddescription.para:
A jitter cam can be used for anti aliasing a static scene. A ray that will be cast into the scene normally starts off at the exact same position. The jitter cam will jitter or scatter the ray's starting position slightly using random values.
flag
Enable or disable the jitter cam.
Disables SSAA automatically.

simplesect.para: Returns true, if jitter cam is enabled.

briefdescription.para: Used to set the jitter cam's sample rate.

simplesect.para: Returns the jitter cam's sample rate .

briefdescription.para: Used to set the jitter cam's sample rate per raygen.

parameterdescription.para: Used to make the jitter cam faster by casting n rays directly in the raygen shader.

simplesect.para: It is advised to set a higher value for sampleRatePerRayGen and lowering sampleRate instead.
Returns the jitter cam's sample rate per raygen.

briefdescription.para: Used to toggle SSAA.

parameterdescription.para: If true, SSAA will be activated.

simplesect.para: Returns true, if SSAA is enabled.

briefdescription.para: Used to set the SSAA sample rate.

parameterdescription.para: The desired SSAA sample rate. If this value is zero, then the sample rate will be set to one.

briefdescription.para: This function will be called by Rayex::init() in case the path was not set manually.

simplesect.para: This function might file in setting the correct path. That is why it is recommended to set it automatically using setAssetsPath(std::string).

briefdescription.para: Exposes all graphic settings supported by the renderer.

detaileddescription.para:
Any necessary pipeline recreations and swapchain recreations will not be performed at the point of calling any setter but instead the next time the renderer will be updated.
Any function that sets the maximum of a given entity needs to be called before RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Rayex::init().

Add a setUseTotalPathsOnly( bool flag )
